title: Mexico City Artist Studio (live & work) Summer 2021
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


Looking for a responsible someone to rent my live and art work studio in Centro Mexico City this summer while I'm away. Mexico City is open (restaurants, etc.) Flexible dates between May and Oct. 3 months. Furnished, really nice light and so much room to paint or do any activity. 2 bedrooms, one bath; one of the bedrooms is used as additional work space. Will share more info upon request. Thanks :)

# is linked to my WhatsApp
